    wildRtrax 0.1.0
    Changelog

    Function reference

    wt_auth()
    Authenticate into WildTrax
    wt_get_download_summary()
    Get download summary
    wt_download_report()
    Download Reports
    wt_download_tags()
    Download acoustic tags
    wt_get_species()
    Get the WildTrax species table
    wt_report()
    Build automatic reports from analyzed data in wildRtrax
    wt_audio_scanner()
    Scan acoustic data to a standard format
    wt_run_ap()
    Get a variety of acoustic index output from audio
    wt_glean_ap()
    Extract and plot relevant acoustic index metadata and LDFCs
    wt_signal_level()
    Get signals from specific windows of audio
    wt_chop()
    Segment a large audio file
    wt_wac_info()
    Extract relevant metadata from a wac file
    wt_flac_info()
    Extract relevant metadata from a flac file
    wt_make_aru_tasks()
    Linking media to WildTrax
    wt_kaleidoscope_tags()
    Upload hits from a Wildlife Acoustics classifier
    wt_songscope_tags()
    Takes the classifier output from Wildlife Acoustics Songscope and converts them into a WildTrax tag template for upload
    wt_replace_tmtt()
    Replace 'TMTT' abundance entries with model-predicted values.
    wt_summarise_cam()
    Set of analysis functions
    wt_ind_detect()
    Evaluate independent detections in your camera data
    wt_location_distances()
    General convenience functions
    wt_tidy_species()
    Filter the species list to the groups of interest from wt_get_species
    wt_make_wide()
    Convert to a wide survey by species dataframe.
    wt_format_occupancy()
    Format WildTrax report for occupancy modelling.
    wt_qpad_offsets()
    Get QPAD offsets
    wildRtrax wildRtrax-package
    wildRtrax: A series of advanced user functions for environmental sensor data management and an

    Developed by Alex MacPhail, Marcus Becker, Elly Knight.
